text: Me azenir vamɨra ko akuamɨn Jerusalem avɨnigha iti. Ezɨ Sedekaia 11plan azenibar atrivimɨn iti, ezɨ an namba 4ɨn iakɨnimɨn otogha25:2-3 Hibrun akamɨn danganir kam, iakɨnimɨn dɨbobonim itir puvatɨ. Ezɨ Jeremaia 52:6 kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, bizir kam namba 4ɨn iakɨnimɨn oto. ghua, namba 9ɨn aruem otozɨ, men dagheba bar gɨfa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Jerusalemɨn gumazamiziba mɨtiriam bar puv men azi.
